articles.content:
For the first time ever, astronomers have directly detected light from behind a supermassive black hole. The discovery proves Albert Einstein's theory of general relativity was right — again.

articles.title: Sky in Turkey turns green like Sci-fi movie, was it UFO or some satellite? Watch - Zee News
articles.description: The sky in Turkey’s Izmir turned bright green after a meteor crashed into the Earth s atmosphere in the early hours of Saturday (July 31). In a video, an object is seen streaking over the city of Izmir and it disappears leaving a green flare behind.
